resources.string: A button for uploading or capturing photos.

Welcome to Skin ID!
 
 Before you start using our skin lesion identification services, please take a moment to review our privacy agreement. Your privacy and the security of your data are our top priorities.
 
 By using Skin ID, you consent to the processing of images of skin lesions for the purpose of identification. Your information will not be shared with third parties.
 
 Thank you for choosing Skin ID!
Hey there! I\'m Skin ID. I can spot acne, alopecia areata, eczema, psoriasis, Raynaud\'s syndrome, rosacea, vitiligo and warts. Snap a pic to begin!
